relevant_findings.heent: EOMI, PERRL, anicteric sclera, pink conjunctiva, MMM.
relevant_findings.heart: Regular rate, irregular rhythm, S1/S2, holosystolic murmur heard throughout the precordium, no gallops, or rubs.
relevant_findings.lungs: CTAB, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi, breathing comfortably without use of accessory muscles, slight inspiratory crackle over RLL.
relevant_findings.abdomen: +BS, nondistended, nontender in all quadrants, no rebound/guarding, no hepatosplenomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: No cyanosis, clubbing, or edema, prominent heberden nodes bilaterally.
relevant_findings.neuro: A&Ox3, moving all 4 extremities with purpose.
